name: Annoying Robots!
description:
Beat your opponent by getting to the opposite side of the board first!

How to play?

Movement:
- No moving backward.
- Robots can cover smaller robots.
- Robots can move directly or jump over other robots.
- Multiple jumps are permitted.

Misc:
- After jumping, tap "End Turn" to finish the move.
- To select or unselect a robot, simply tap on it.
